page.title: 03Alswick Hall Farms
page.content:
We found that this farm is one of a group of farms owned by the Cooperative Wholesale Society. Some of the others are: Owles Farm Stonebury Farm -both in our Survey area, and another large farm at Anstey, a nearby village. There is very little grazing land locally. Nearly all the land is under the plough, and the farmers concentrate heavily upon growing wheat, barley and oilseed rape. Machinery is used a great deal. We saw many exciting and expensive tractors and other machines.
David Mawer, Garry Chambers, Vincent Robbins
